thread.title: Wanted Vijay Mallya appears at event in UK for launch of F1 car
thread.title_full: Wanted Vijay Mallya appears at event in UK for launch of F1 car

title: Wanted Vijay Mallya appears at event in UK for launch of F1 car
text:
Wanted Vijay Mallya appears at event in UK for launch of F1 car Wanted Vijay Mallya appears at event in UK for launch of F1 car Businessman Vijay Mallya, who is wanted in India for Rs 9,000 crore loan default, was on Wednesday seen at an event in UK promoting a new Formula One car launched by his team Sahara Force India. The new car of his F1 team was launched today at Silverstone. PTI | Feb 22, 2017, 11.01 PM IST Highlights Vijay Mallya was on Wednesday seen at an event in UK promoting a new Formula One car launched by his team Sahara Force India A relaxed Mallya, looking dapper in a suit, was seen with his two drivers 
Vijay Mallya. (Image credit: @ForceIndiaF1/Twitter) NEW DELHI: Businessman Vijay Mallya , who is wanted in India for Rs 9,000 crore loan default, was on Wednesday seen at an event in UK promoting a new Formula One car launched by his team Sahara Force India . A relaxed Mallya, looking dapper in a suit, was seen with his two drivers Sergio Perez and Esteban Ocon in a photograph uploaded by official Formula One website. The new car of his F1 team was launched today at Silverstone. Mallya has been on the radar of the Indian agencies for a long time now and the government has been in talks with the UK government for his extradition over charges of multi-crore loan default.
